FuncDef:
The netstream export ip template timeout-rate command sets the interval at which the template for exporting IPv4 original flow statistics and IPv4 flexible flow statistics in V9 format is refreshed.
The undo netstream export ip template timeout-rate command restores the default setting. The netstream export ip template timeout-rate command sets the interval at which the template for exporting IPv4 original flow statistics and IPv4 flexible flow statistics in V9 format is refreshed. The undo netstream export ip template timeout-rate command restores the default setting. By default, the template is refreshed every 1 minute.
CLIs: undo netstream export ip template timeout-rate [ <timeout-interval> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interval for refreshing the V9 template.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 3600, in minutes. The default value is 1.
